channel.title: Tokkul Shop

item.title: Tokkul Shop
item.dc:creator: @Naseem Naseem
item.description:
@Naseem wrote:

I have a little problem with tokkul shop, when i try to buy something from the tokkul shop and i have in my bag for example 150 tokkul and an items worth 150 tokkuls, i can’t buy it, also i can’t buy anything from it,

Here’s the code that i added in shop assistant.java

1-

Slot1 = c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529);

2-

if(Slot1 == -1 && c.myShopId == 25) {
					c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul.");
					break;
				}

3-

if(c.myShopId == 25) {
                	if (c.playerItemsN[Slot1] >= TotPrice2) {
						if (c.getItems().freeSlots() > 0) {
							buyDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
							c.getItems().deleteItem(6529, c.getItems().getItemSlot(6529), TotPrice2);
							c.getItems().addItem(itemID, 1);
							Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[c.myShopId][fromSlot] -= 1;
							Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
							if ((fromSlot + 1) > Server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[c.myShopId]) {
								Server.shopHandler.ShopItems[c.myShopId][fromSlot] = 0;
							}
						} else {
							c.sendMessage("You don't have enough space in your inventory.");
							break;
						}
					} else {
						c.sendMessage("You don't have enough tokkul.");
						break;
					}
                }

4-

if (c.myShopId == 25) {
				handleOtherShop(itemID);
				return false;
			}

5-

if (c.myShopId == 25) {
			c.sendMessage(c.getItems().getItemName(removeId)+": currently costs " + getSpecialItemValue(removeId) + " tokkuls");
			return;
		}

6- I added this two

case 11664:
return 100;
case 8839:
case 8840:
return 150;

Anyone can help me with this?

Read full topic
